FrozenLake-v1.name: FrozenLake (Slippery)
FrozenLake-v1.description: Navigate a frozen lake from start to goal without falling into holes. The surface is slippery, making movement stochastic.

sections.goal: Reach the goal tile (G) starting from the start tile (S) without falling into holes (H).

stateSpace.description: 16 tiles in a 4×4 grid. Each tile represents one state.

rewards.description: Sparse reward: +1 for reaching goal, 0 otherwise.

sections.stochasticity: Slippery surface: 33% chance of moving perpendicular to intended direction.
sections.difficulty: The 4×4 version has ~0.7 optimal success rate due to stochasticity.

FrozenLake-v1-NoSlip.name: FrozenLake (No Slip)
FrozenLake-v1-NoSlip.description: Navigate a frozen lake from start to goal without falling into holes. The surface is NOT slippery, making movement deterministic.

sections.goal: Reach the goal tile (G) starting from the start tile (S) without falling into holes (H).

stateSpace.description: 16 tiles in a 4×4 grid. Each tile represents one state.

rewards.description: Sparse reward: +1 for reaching goal, 0 otherwise.

sections.stochasticity: Deterministic: Agent always moves in the intended direction.
sections.difficulty: Easier than slippery version. Optimal policy achieves 100% success rate.
